items.badge_description: Happy Untappd anniversary to you! Thanks for sticking around and drinking socially with us. Cheers! That's 4 years on Untappd!

items.badge_name: Super Style: IPA - New England / Hazy (Level 23)
items.badge_description: The haze craze is here for days. The third in our series of Super Style badges, this one celebrates New England-style / hazy IPAs, which ranked as the 2nd most checked-in style of 2021. AVAILABLE ONLY TO UNTAPPD INSIDERS.

You may not be able to see through the haze, but that juicy, hoppy goodness goes down smooth. What started as a trend is here to stay. That's 270 different beers with the style of IPA - New England / Hazy, Pale Ale - New England / Hazy, IPA - Milkshake, or Pale Ale - Milkshake. Try 5 more for Level 55!
